isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-6613 SERIES - INSTALL - SHIFTER HOUSING AND GEAR SHIFT LEVER HOUSING

svcproc.title: SHIFTER HOUSING AND GEAR SHIFT LEVER HOUSING

step1.para: Check to make sure that the shift yokes and sliding clutches are in the neutral position. Install the shifter housing assembly on the transmission, tension spring cover to the front and the yoke forks in the sliding clutches ( Figure 276). Secure with the 13 bolts. Tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N·m).

figure.caption: Figure 275. Install Shifter Housing Assembly on Transmission

step1.para: Make sure the three tension springs and balls are in the shifter housing bores and install the gear shift lever housing and gasket on the shifter housing. Tighten bolts to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N·m).
